products.title: Geometric Metallic Sterling Grey Roman Blind

Your new geometric metallic sterling silver roman blind, blends a striking silver shade with interwoven reflective silver threadwork to help create a modern, inspiring final look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
